note: I am the Co-Founder & Chief Business Development Officer of Next FinTech Holdings, a division of NextPlayTechnologies.com (NASDAQ: NXTP), which offers innovative solutions in online banking, digital assets, and insurance. I also serve as Executive Director and Head of Business Development for NextBank International Inc, a wholly owned subsidiary of Next Fintech which is a chartered financial enterprise entity incorporated under the laws of the commonwealth of Puerto Rico.
